snippet.title: N.O.V.A. 3 - Near Orbit Vanguard Alliance
snippet.description:
Discover the first video of the next blockbuster from Gameloft: the third episode of N.O.V.A. sequel ! Kal Wardin is back for his third journey - Coming soon !
Download the exclusive artwork on:
https://www.facebook.com/gameloft/app_335548166507490
Visit our official website on:
http://www.gameloft.fr/
